item.description:
Fun, Sports, Relaxing&Socializing! Don't miss our FINAL Weekend Getaway Event of the Year / Fun Meetup Getaway

Fun, Sports, Relaxing and Socializing! Don't miss our 2010 / Annual Fun Meetup Getaway , Book Today by calling Greg at 917-868-4268 to Join us and Reserve Your Spot !! THE FINAL Getaway Weekend usually sells out 1-2 weeks in advance and will fill up soon, DON'T GET CLOSED OUT, Sign up TODAY (Mid-sept.) /ASAP by calling 917-868-4268

Call Greg @ 917-868-4268 if interested,
Book Today and Mention FUN MEETUP to save $ off the weekend & Get a FREE DRINK Book !!! (Type Fun Meetup in the How did you hear about box) call me @ 917-868-4268 if any questions !

Note: Getaway Weekends typically sell out in advance, Advance Reservations are required , call 917-868-4268 if questions, Usually sell out weeks before the event !!!

Fun Meetup Presents Fun Meetup Getaway, Fun Getaway Weekend !

Join us in Kent , CT, for the summer Weekend ! Bus leaves friday at 5:30pm from the upper east side, NYC, or meet us up there !
Weekends sell out in advance (up to 1-2 weeks before we leave) and
reservations are required! call me @917-868-4268 if questions!

Join us for this amazing weekend !!! (make sure to mention
Fun Meetup if booking by phone or type Fun Meetup in the comment box
if booking online to get the discount and some free drinks !


The hottest sports, adventures and parties are at Club Getaway this
Fall Weekend! In addition to all the cool Getaway stuff like
the flying trapeze, tennis, mountain biking, volleyball
and rock climbing, we've got a weekend packed with great special
events.

Join us for this great weekend, Don't get closed out, Book
Today , call me @ 917-868-4268 if questions !

Choose any weekend and mention Fun Meetup when reserving for your FREE FUN MEETUP DRINKS BOOK !!

Sample Schedule, we'll get the official schedule Friday Night upon check in or saturday morning!!!
Saturday Afternoon/Night
2:00 - 3:00 pm Tennis Tournament
2:00 - 3:30 pm Basketball Clinic with Hollis Copeland
2:00 - 3:30 pm Rock Climbing
2:00 - 3:30 pm Intermidiate Road Biking - 10 miles
2:00 - 3:30 pm Mountain Bike II - Single Track Trails Intermediate
2:00 - 3:30 pm Archery Class
2:00 - 3:30 pm Co-ed Volleyball Tournament
2:00 - 3:30 pm Latin and Swing Dance Class 2:00 - 3:30 pm Walk to Kent for Shopping or Ice Cream
2:00 - 4:00 pm Advanced Trapeze
2:30 - 4:30 pm Mountain Bike II - Single Track Trails Intermediate
2:30 - 4:30 pm Arts & Crafts
3:00 - 4:30 pm Fly on the Bungee Trampoline
3:30 - 5:00 pm Advanced Road Bike
3:30 - 5:00 pm Swing Dancing with Lucky
3:30 - 5:00 pm Wine Tasting with Wine Expert Horst
4:00 - 5:30 pm Co-ed Keg Softball
4:30 - 5:30 pm Bike Trip to Town for Ice Cream
4:30 - 5:30 pm Yoga with NYC's OM Yoga
4:30 - 5:30 pm Collage Art Class
4:30 - 7:00 pm Lakeside Happy Hour: Live Music, Complemantary BBQ Grill and Drink Specials
4:30 - 6:00 pm Texas Hold'em Poker
8:00 - 9:30 pm Restauratore Italiano under the Tent followed by Rob and The River Boys Live
9:30 pm The Out of this World Party at the Boat House Lounge with DJ . Haunted House. Dancing till the wee hours.
12:00 am Midnight Campfire with Live Music and S'mores


Fall Sports Weekend Events Include:
Tailgate Party
Pumpkin Carving
Haunted House
Club Getaway's Famous Costume Party!! ((Bring up a costume with you))

You Can Do It All...Or Nothing At All

Get Active
Meet your match in basketball, volleyball or tennis. Hit the road with one of our Specialized road bikes. Share a keg at our co-ed softball game or team up for an action packed game of dodgeball.

Seek Adventure
Climb the Berkshire Mountains and rappel down a rock ledge. Hike along the Appalachian Trail or around camp. Discover the rush of soaring through the air on a flying trapeze or the 350-foot aerial zip line.

Be Creative
Stimulate your senses with the arts, food and wine. Become a salsa sensation in dance class. Let chefs from the Connecticut Culinary Institute show you how to cook up delicious dishes.

Just Relax
Take a short walk to the charming town of Kent, Connecticut to enjoy an ice cream cone and browse through the antique shops. Lounge by the lake with a good book. Take a yoga , massage or wine tasting class.

Party On
Share the day’s adventure at Happy Hour by the lake with live music, great drinks, and a complimentary BBQ. Dance in the Boat House Club. Play volleyball under the stars. Join strumming guitars and s'mores around the campfire.

"As the only facility of its kind on the East Coast. The club is leading the way in sports, adventure, fitness, and feeling-good vacations…The bottom line at Club Getaway is that everyone has a good time.


- New York Post"
BOOK Our Last 2010 Weekend CAMP / Getaway WEEKEND and Mention FUN MEETUP to save $ & Get FREE DRINKS , Join us this season!!!

This is the final Getaway of 2010 !((Halloween Theme weekend, the 10/1 weekend always closes out in advance, Don't get closed out, JOIN US, call 917-868-4268 if questions/ to signup)) ((RSVPing yes or maybe is not enough, you must book your spot in advance with credit card, call 917-868-4268, FunMeetupGetaway , Don't miss this Great Weekend !))
item.how_to_find_us: call Greg @ 917-868-4268 meet at dinner Friday Night !!!

group.name: #1 Meetup - BOSTON MEETUP, Travel& Events, BOSTONMEETUP.org
